title: When I get a notification, majority of the time, the sound is incorrect from the one I have chosen.
content:
When I get a notification, majority of the time, the sound is incorrect from the one I have chosen.
I have tried changing the notification tone but it continues to be the same incorrect tone. I have it set to the popcorn tone and it was working fine until today. Now it's just a plain single ding unless I am in the app itself.
